item.title: Contact
item.description: 11 Reasons to Celebrate Columbo’s Day Instead of Columbus Day Happy Columbo’s Day! Federal Government To Recognize Columbo Day Instead of Columbus Day From Now On Christopher Columbus: 3 things you think he did that he didn’t Why Do We Celebrate Columbus Day and Not Leif Erikson Day? Why police have to guard a statue of Christopher Columbus in New York around the clock

item.title: Did You Know?
item.description: Did you know these interesting facts about “Columbo”??? Columbo on stage at the Frank Sinatra roast Did you know that Lt. Columbo appeared on stage at a Frank Sinatra roast? While it’s definitely unorthodox for a lieutenant to “roast” a famous singer like “The Chairman”, the crowd seemed to love it. Columbo statue in Hungary Did you know that there is a Colubmo statue in Budapest, Hungary? Supposedly the actor that played Columbo, Peter Falk, is related to 19th-century Hungarian political figure Miksa Falk.

item.title: Where to watch Columbo
item.description: What better to celebrate Columbo Day than to actually watch Columbo? Here’s where you can watch this critically acclaimed show: Besides weird TV channels like MeTV (?), the Hallmark Movies & Mysteries channel seems to show episodes of “Columbo”. Check your local listings for details. Although it seems like full episode clips are taken down for copyright issues, there are plenty of classic “Columbo” clips on Youtube! Just search for “columbo” to watch!
